p: EOs were extracted from total foliar biomasses obtained from all soil types using Clevenger-type apparatus for 3 h until no more EO was recovered, in accordance with the method described in the Europe Pharmacopoeia [ 26]. EOs were stored at 4 Â°C in tightly closed glass vials until their analysis. EO yield, expressed in mL/g, was calculated by measuring the volume of oil extracted per weight of fresh plant material.
